plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?
I have a trunk and leaves, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am red and round and grow on a tree. People like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Doctors say one a day keeps them away.
🥧 You can make a pie with me.

plant.question: I'm long and orange, and rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I help you see in the dark.
✨ You can eat me raw or cooked.

plant.question: I am tall and yellow and grow in a field. You can make popcorn from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 People eat me at the movies.
🐔 Chickens like to eat me too.

plant.question: I have petals and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am a hard seed that falls from a tree. Squirrels like to bury me for winter. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I fall from oak trees in autumn.

plant.question: I am green and leafy and grow in a head. You can make a salad with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am often used in salads.
🥬 I am a type of vegetable.

plant.question: I am a plant with prickly stems and beautiful, fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often a gift for someone you love.
❤️ I am red, pink, white or yellow.

plant.question: I grow underground and have a brown or red skin and white or yellow flesh. You can make fries from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make French fries from me.

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a pond. What am I?
I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.

animal.question: I give you milk, and I say 'Moo'. What am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. I live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I am a horse-like animal from Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 Each of us has unique stripes.
🐆 I am prey for predators in the wild.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I'm the tallest mammal on earth.
🍃 I love to eat acacia leaves.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I make a funny 'ooh ooh aah aah' sound.
🍌 I peel the skin of my favorite fruit.

animal.question: I am the king of the jungle and roar very loudly. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a mane around my head.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. I live in Australia. What am I?
